free: #e there is an old man.
#c 有一個老人，
#e when the fruit ripe
#c 水果成熟的時候。
#e probably it is guava or pear.
#c 可能是芭樂或是梨子。
#n IU10 quti 'dung 糞', rodux 'rooster 雞'
#e the fruits are big.
#c 水果很大。
#e the old man goes up ladder and he picks fruits.
#c 老人走上梯子去採收。
#e That old man carries baskets to put fruits.
#c 那個老人帶藍子放水果。
#e And also (he) carries a ladder.
#c （他）還帶梯子。
#e the mother tree is big
#c 那棵樹很大，
#e When the tree bears fruits, you cannot reach hand to pick up. One has to climb ladder up to pick (them) up.
#c 水果結果實的時候，伸手也拿不到，必須爬梯子上去採收。
#e the old man is picking fruits.
#c 這老人在摘水果。
#e then when he picks two baskets of fruits,
#c 然後他採兩籃水果的時候，
#e an elder boy passes there.
#c 一個青年經過那裡。
#e he carries a sheep.
#c 他牽著羊，
#e maybe he is going to feed the sheep.
#c 可能他去餵羊。
#e then carrying the sheep, he passed under the tree that the old man is picking fruits.
#c 牽著羊，他經過老人正在採水果的果樹下面。
#e he passes, go toward the place where he raises sheep.
#c 他經過，然後往他養羊的地方走去。
#e in a short while, there is a child.
#c 不久有一個小孩，
#e he is riding a rulu. Rulu is a bike.
#c 他在騎rulu。Rulu是腳踏車的意思。
#e jidensha is the Japanese word,
#c jidensha是日語。
#e the child is riding bike and he comes under...
#c 然後這小孩騎腳踏車來下面...
#n IU82 moda=muda
#e he saw the old man is picking fruits above.
#c 他看到老人在上面採水果。
#e then he put picked fruits on the ground.
#c 然後他把採過的水果放在地上，
#e basket is put on the ground.
#c 然後在地上放著籃子。
#e thus at that time, the child left.
#c 接著那時候這小孩離開了。
#e he saw the old man, picking fruits up there.
#c 他看老人在上面那裡採收，
#e at that time, the old man is picking fruits very hard,
#c 然後那時候，老人專心地採收，
#e he did not even know the child was looking.
#c 他並不知道小孩在看。
#e he stole one basket of fruits.
#c 他偷一籃水果。
#e the fruit looks like guava.
#c 水果看起來是芭樂。
#e then he put basket in front of his bike,
#c 然後他把籃子放在他腳踏車前面，
#e then he sees the old man,
#c 然後他看這個老人，
#e probably he is saying that 'it is okay, he is not seeing'.
#c 可能在說：「沒有關係，他沒在看。」
#n IU 128 ini huwa 'it does not matter 沒關係'
#e at that time he stole and carried the basket.
#c 那時候他偷偷地帶走籃子，
#e the child is going house.
#c 小孩回家，
#e the fruit he stealthily took away, I wonder where he brings or whether he sells.
#c 他偷偷帶走的果實，不曉得要帶到那裏或要賣。
#e when he is on the way, before arriving at his house, he met a girl.
#c 在路上，還沒到家的時候，他遇見一個女孩。
#e the girl also is riding a bike.
#c 女孩也騎腳踏車來。
#n densha should be shortened form of jidensha.
#e at that time the girl was riding bike.
#c 那時候女孩騎腳踏車，
#e because he is a boy, probably he thinks the girl is cute.
#c 因為他是男生，可能看女孩子長得可愛，
#e the boy sees the girl and then,
#c 這小孩看女孩，然後，
#e So, he did not know that there was a stone in the road, the bike bumped into the stone, then the child fell.
#c 所以他不知道路上有石頭，然後腳踏車撞到石頭，然後小孩跌倒。
#e he fell down and then the fruit spilled.
#c 他跌倒，然後水果傾倒，
#e the hat also went away. The girl touched it and it leaped far away.
#c 帽子也飛走了，女孩碰落帽子，然後帽子摔出遠方。
#e the hat he was wearing went far away.
#c 他戴的帽子飛遠方了，
#e so the basket of fruits he stole spilled away to the other side.
#c 所以，他偷偷帶來的一籃水果摔出去另一邊。
#e because the child fell, he got a little hurt.
#c 小孩因為跌倒他受一點傷，
#e So, he is looking at the scar to see if it is bleeding.
#c 所以他看傷口有沒有流血。
#e then three children come.
#c 然後三個小孩來，
#n IU187 dung=dungan
#e they are almost the same age as him. Maybe they are on their way to play.
#c 他們跟他差不多的年齡，他們可能去玩。
#e Three children came.
#c 三個小孩來，
#e they saw the child who stealthily took fruits fell down.
#c （三個小孩）看到那個偷拿水果的小孩跌倒了，
#e then they maybe felt pitiful, so help him picking the fruits and to put in the basket,
#c 然後他們可能覺得他可憐，所以幫他撿水果放在籃子裡。
#e then they raise the child, and put the basket back to under the bike.
#c 然後他們扶小孩起來，然後把籃子再放到腳踏車下，
#e they are helping him.
#c 他們幫助他。
#e they felt pitiful. he got big hurt, maybe he cannot to go home.
#c 他們可憐他，可能他受大傷不能回家。
#e then after they finished, he carried the basket.
#c 然後他們幫忙完了後，他帶籃子。
#e then children left, the three children left to go to play.
#c 然後小孩們離開，三個小孩去玩。
#e their destination was not the same. The small child who stole was going home.
#c 他們的方向不同，比較小的偷東西的孩子要回家。
#e but he does not ride bike.
#c 但是他沒有騎腳踏車，
#e then maybe the child got hurt, he probably has no power to do to pedal the bike,
#c 然後可能這小孩受傷，他可能沒力氣踩腳踏車，
#e he is pulling the bike while waking, stealthily bringing the basket of fruits.
#c 他牽著腳踏車走路，偷偷帶著一籃水果。
#e he walked a little and looked back.
#c 他走了一下之後回頭看，
#e he sees the three children who helped him.
#c 他看了幫忙過他的那三個小孩。
#e the three children, they have one...
#c 三個小孩,他們有一個...
#e while walking they saw a hat. they took the hat and they probably knew it belongs to the child who fell down,
#c 他們走路看到這個帽子，把帽子撿起來,可能知道那是跌倒的小孩的。
#e they looked at each other, and they said this is his hat, so one of them sent it back.
#c 他們互相看，他們說帽子是他的，所以由其中一個送回來。
#e when he gave the hat back, the child who fell and stole fruits took three fruits and gave them, to the boy who helped him.
#c 他還帽子的時候，跌倒又偷水果的那孩子拿了三個水果，送給幫忙他的男孩們。
#e then they left.
#c 然後他們離開。
#n pn-kingan "一人一個"。
#e the boy who fell gave the three fruits to each one.
#c 那個跌倒的男孩把三個水果給每一個人。
#e each one left eating the fruit.
#c 每個人都邊走邊吃水果。
#e the three of them came to the place the old man is picking fruits.
#c 他們三個來到老人採水果那兒。
#e they passes the road as usual.
#c 他們同樣是經過，
#e the old man sees.
#c 這老人看，
#e he went up to pick fruits when the child stole the fruit earlier.
#c 先前小孩偷走的時候，他正好上去採收，
#e so when he comes down, he sees the fruits he picked.
#c 所以他下來的時候，看他採的水果。
#e "I have just picked two baskets of fruits. Why there left only one", he says.
#c 「我剛才採了兩籃，為什麼現在只剩下一籃了？」他說。
#e he seems not confused.
#c 他好像想不通，
#e he thinks where one basket is gone.
#c 他在想另一個籃子到哪去了。
#e the three children passed there. They were eating the fruit.
#c 他們三位走路經過那裡，嘴裏吃著那個樹果，
#e so the old man probably thinks,
#c 所以這老人可能想，
#e but he did not say 'did you steal?' then,
#c 但是他也沒有問說「你們（的水果是不是）偷的？」然後，
#e he did not ask to the young men and they went to play.
#c 他並沒有質問男孩，然後男孩們就去玩了。
